ComicInfo.Summary:
A small Florida town manages a strange kind of survival in the shadow of a giant monster where Abe finds secrets about his origins and his role in the end of the world.
Abe's flashback serves a follow-up to Sir Edward Grey, Witchfinder: The Mysteries of Unland, picking up directly from where that series' epilogue left off. Tyler Crook served as the artist on that series and returns here to draw this flashback.
